mapper.insert: INSERT INTO systematic_notification (uuid, content, type, status) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{content}, #{type}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, uuid, content, create_time, type, status FROM systematic_notification WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND status != 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT id, uuid, content, create_time, type, status FROM systematic_notification WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT id, uuid, content, create_time, type, status FROM systematic_notification WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND status = 2 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM systematic_notification WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND status != 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM systematic_notification WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM systematic_notification WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND status = 2
SELECT id, uuid, content, create_time, type, status FROM systematic_notification WHERE id = #{id} AND uuid = #{uuid} AND status != 0
